contributionDescription:
1) Creating over 400 videos covering a wide range of cryptocurrency topics and educational content for my YouTube channel, which boasts 12,500 subscribers.

2) Foestering a thriving community of more than 2,000 French-speaking crypto enthusiasts on my Discord server.

3) Providing valuable insights and real-life examples of various scam attacks to help safeguard users.

contributionLinks.description: Explaining how to avoid 4 of the most common crypto scams
Showcasing useful tools for Crypto Users
Guide on how to revoke a malicious token approval
Explaining how secure BIP39 seeds are
Explaining the danger behind memecoins / shitcoins
Showcasing how high APR farm works, and why it's risky
How to use Dune Analytics to explore various data sets
Guide on how to Optimism and other L2
Explaining how a Sandwich Attack works, how to protect yourself from it
Creator of a 2000+ users crypto Discord where users help each other

impactDescription:
1) I assisted over 12,500 users in beginning their blockchain journey through my YouTube channel.

2) I increased awareness of the Optimism Collective by creating various videos on Base, Zora, and Optimism. In the past year, my videos collectively received more than 612,000 views.

3) I actively thwarted common scams through a series of security-focused videos.

4) I provided support to over 2,000 users by responding to questions, offering tips, and sharing discoveries on my Discord server.

fundingSources.description: Received through YouTube advertising over a period of 2,5 years.
Sale of advanced crypto guides and one-on-one coaching over 2,5 years.

pwCategorySuggestions: Content Creation, Community Building, Education, Awareness, Security
